instruction:
IMPORTANT: You must return a valid JSON object.

OUTPUT FORMAT:
{
    "has_insight": boolean,
    "type": "suggestion" | "warning" | "opportunity" | "fact" | "praise",
    "content": "Your advice/insight here",
    "confidence": 0.0-1.0,
    "metadata": {},
    "events": [
        {"name": "event_name", "payload": {"key": "value"}}
    ],
    "variable_updates": {"key": "value"},
    "queue_pushes": {"queue_name": [{"item": "data"}]},
    "facts": [
        {"type": "fact_type", "key": "optional_key", "value": "extracted_value", "confidence": 0.9}
    ],
    "memory_updates": {"key": "value"}
}

NOTES:
- Set has_insight=true only if you have meaningful advice to share
- events: Use to trigger other agents (e.g., "question_detected")
- variable_updates: Update shared session state
- queue_pushes: Add items to work queues
- facts: Extract knowledge like budget, timeline, stakeholders
- memory_updates: Update your private scratchpad
